name: GetClaimableWorkspacesByEnterpriseId
description:
Retrieve claimable workspaces by enterprise ID.

Use this tool to get the list of workspaces that an enterprise can claim by specifying its ID. You can optionally filter the results based on activity status.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the enterprise for which you want to retrieve claimable workspaces.

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve

parameters.name: max_number_of_workspaces
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of workspaces to retrieve and return.

value_schema.description: Limits the number of workspaces to be sorted

parameters.name: sort_order_for_documents
parameters.description: Specifies the sort order to return matching workspaces in the response.

value_schema.description: Specifies the sort order to return matching documents

parameters.name: enterprise_name
parameters.description: The name of the enterprise to retrieve claimable workspaces for. Specify to filter workspaces by enterprise name.

value_schema.description: Name of the enterprise to retrieve workspaces for

parameters.name: active_since_date
parameters.description: The date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) to filter workspaces active until that date.

value_schema.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format indicating the date to search up to for activeness of workspace

parameters.name: search_inactive_since_date
parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format to search up to for inactive workspaces. Filters results by workspace inactiveness.

value_schema.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format indicating the date to search up to for inactiveness of workspace

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of workspaces to be sorted

value_schema.description: Limits the number of workspaces to be sorted

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Specifies the sort order to return matching documents

value_schema.description: Specifies the sort order to return matching documents

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the enterprise to retrieve workspaces for

value_schema.description: Name of the enterprise to retrieve workspaces for

parameters.name: activeSince
parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format indicating the date to search up to for activeness of workspace

value_schema.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format indicating the date to search up to for activeness of workspace

parameters.name: inactiveSince
parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format indicating the date to search up to for inactiveness of workspace

value_schema.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format indicating the date to search up to for inactiveness of workspace

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve
